title: Group Queue
body: Riot, Please tell me as to why my client crashes in moments when we find Queue? Within this patch its been happening recently and ive been unable to play with my friends/club members so please let me know asap. If its some bug, please fix for me, if not could be something wrong with the client itself as i never experienced this before. Reply to me if you have a solution for another way for this thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Has this happened since the temporary fix relating to club tags was applied (15/03/16 8:42pm AEDT)?
